title: [BUG] NRE in SKElement when PresentationSource.FromVisual(this) returns null
body:
**Description**

If an SKElement is added to the presentation hierarchy before that hierarchy is visible, SKElement.OnRender is still called in some cases and an NRE results.

**Code**

I don't know of a simple way to reproduce this as it happens when using SkiaSharp in combination with XWT and even then only in rare circumstances.

**Expected Behavior**

SKElement.OnRender should do nothing

**Actual Behavior**

SKElement.OnRender proceeds to call CreateSize, which causes an NRE at the following line when PresentationSource.FromVisual(this) returns null:
var m = PresentationSource.FromVisual(this).CompositionTarget.TransformToDevice;

**Basic Information**

- Version with issue:  2.80.2
- Last known good version:  N/A
- IDE:  Visual Studio
- Platform Target Frameworks:
  - Windows Classic:  Windows 10
- Target Devices: N/A
